vsync

Class ValueReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • vsync.ValueReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VSyncConstants

    public class ValueReceiver
extends Object
implements VSyncConstants
    The ValueReceiver is used to synchronize values from an Arduino to the Processing sketch. If you have a variable on your Arduino -- for example the reading from an analog pin -- you can use ValueReceiver to synchronize it with a variable in your sketch. Have a look at the SimpleReceiver example for the minimal steps to get going.

        public ValueReceiver(PApplet parent,

    • Method Detail

      • observe

        public ValueReceiver observe(String variable)
        Starts the observation of a new variable. Whenever the variable changed on the Arduino it is updated in the sketch too. The variable should be declared publicand must be of type int!
        Parameters:
        The - name of the variable to observe.
